meanings.definition: The act or process of making something equal or uniform.
meanings.sent1: The equalization of the candies in the jar was done carefully.
meanings.sent2: The equalization of opportunities for all students is important.
meanings.sent3: The equalization of the cake slices led to some funny shapes.
meanings.sent4: The equalization of the playing field in sports levels the competition.
meanings.sent5: The equalization of the colors in the painting made it more appealing.

meanings.definition: The result of making something equal or uniform.
meanings.sent1: After the equalization, everyone had the same amount of pencils.
meanings.sent2: The equalization of the sound levels made the music more enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The equalization of the team's scores caused a tie in the game.
meanings.sent4: The equalization of the prices brought fairness to the market.
meanings.sent5: The equalization of the sizes of the shirts made shopping easier.
